definition: stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: The selective grinding on particle size in the rod mill has been illustrated and discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了棒磨機中的粒度選擇性磨礦現象。
